all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
If thou art merry, praise the Lord with singing, with music, with dancing, and with a prayer of praise and thanksgiving.
Doctrine and Covenants 136:28
Quote of the Day
"What if you’re different from people around you? That doesn’t make you a misfit—it makes you a needed part of the body of Christ."
Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
